description: Request for a Screening Opinion in Accordance with Regulation 5 of the Town and Country Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) Regulations 2011 (as amended) for redevelopment of the site (following demolition of existing building except for retained cinema fa√ßade) to provide multi-screen cinema of up to 3,114 sqm including mezzanine levels, up to 3,358 sqm mixed commercial floor space (Use Class A1/A2/A3/A4/D2) at ground and part first floor level, gallery space (Use Class D1) and up to 209 residential units (Use Class C3) in buildings of between 6 and 9 storeys in height; and, creation of public realm, parking and servicing.
decision_conditions: The proposed development falls within 'Schedule 2 Development (Urban Development Project)' as defined by Section 10(b)(iii), in so far as the area of the development exceeds 0.5 hectares. | The proposed development has been 'screened', having regard to the selection criteria for screening Schedule 2 Development as set out in 'Schedule 3'; namely having regard to (a) the characteristics of development, (b) the location of development; and (c) the characteristics of the potential impact. | The Local Planning Authority is of the opinion that the proposed development will not be likely to have significant effects on the environment as interpreted by the EIA Regulations (as amended); and therefore does not constitute EIA development requiring an Environmental Statement. This is not to say that the proposed development will not have environmental effects of a localised nature which will need to be considered in determining any planning application(s).
